CodeList.Name: Bladder Control Scale Questionnaire Test Code

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you lost control of your bladder or had an accident?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BLCS - Lost Control of Your Bladder

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you almost lost control of your bladder or had an accident?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BLCS - Almost Lost Control of Your Bladder

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you altered your activities because of bladder problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BLCS - Altered Activities Because Bladder Problems

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Bladder Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how much have bladder problems restricted your overall lifestyle?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BLCS - Bladder Problems Restrict Overall Lifestyle

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Bladder Control Scale Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Bladder Control Scale Test Code Terminology
